headline: Akamai Launches Program to Accelerate Cloud Growth for Independent Software Vendors
summary: New Referral-Based Program Offers ISVs Path to Growth on Akamai's Globally Distributed Cloud PlatformCAMBRIDGE, Mass., Dec. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, today announced the launch of ISV Catalyst, a new partner program designed specifically for Independent Software Vendors (ISVs) to accelerate growth through strategic partnership. ISV Catalyst is a referral-based part
